description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Due to light pollution the stars in the sky are now barely visible near major cities. It is your job to fix this problem and brighten the stars!  Using gravity to sling-shot yourself around levels you must brighten the cosmos so everyone can enjoy a bright starry night in all it's splendour.
